text: Titia moi saise, aru ta te komjur ghora ekta thakise! Aru etu uporte bohi thaka laga naam to Mora thakise, aru Hades tai laga pichete jai thakise. Prithibi laga char bhag laga ek bhag to taike adhikar dise, talwar pora morai dibole nimite, aru akaal pora, aru bemar pora, aru jongol te thaka janwar khan pora morai dibole nimite.
